title: [Skin Idea] Arclight Jhin

replies.body:
This skin looks pretty cool and is quite the departure from his classic and high noon themes (and that's good; we don't want skins to be too similar). The only reason I wouldn't like this is because I'm hoping that the "Arclight" theme continues to be exclusive to champions whose names start with the letter "V".

So far we have Arclight {{champion:110}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:161}} 

Arclight {{champion:45}} {{champion:254}} {{champion:112}} {{champion:8}} {{champion:106}} could be awesome.

It's silly, I know. This skin is great, and that's my only reason for not wanting it.
Justicar Jhin
Hey, perfect!
Isn't the arclight skin line also associated with champions who have marking passives? If so, I would love to see an arclight kennen or arclight kindred.
Jhin marks you with his autos, his allies' autos, his trap, his ult... :D

Arclight {{champion:150}} 
Kappa
You joke, but that would be sweet.
Gnar-clight

Well, Vayne and Varus' marking passives are their W's, but Vel'koz's is his innate passive. It seems a more tenuous connection than their names all starting with the same letter.

(And as someone who owns all Kennen's skins, I'd probably instantly buy Arclight Kennen, or any Kennen skin, for that matter.)

Makes sense. I just always went with the assumption that marking champions got arclight.

I play a little bit of kennen and I must say that his blood moon skin might be my favorite skin in the game. The particles are just gorgeous. And the recall animation <3
Kindred really needs a skin too!
Hmmm why not nature Lamb and Wolf where wolf has brown fur n a green mask, (lol i dont know just the feel of nature n all that stuff
Elder Wood Kindred?
Yes lol
Check out Super Galaxy Kindred (and Fizz and Shyvana) on S@20.
It was actually just announced that kindred is getting a super galaxy skin
I would instabuy Arclight {{champion:106}}. Also, if they ever make an Arclight {{champion:12}}, he would literally be a Holy Cow.
There's a way to voice your opinion without sounding hurtful, sticker or not. Like ooMarkofKaine did! :)

They also all have 3-hit passives.

Vel'Koz's true damage 3-hit passive.

Vi's 3-hit armor shred on W passive.

Vayne's 3-hit true damage on W passive.
But Vi doesn't have an Arclight skin yet, and Varus, who does, doesn't have a 3-hit passive. (His W stacks cap at 3, but that's not a 3-hit passive.)
It stacks 3 times, on-hit. Cmon man. Give this one to me.
Can we please get a galactic zac? Lol i can imagine Aurelion sol's color scheme but for Zac where you have this star in the universe looking skin
I don't know why you're asking me, but it sounds cool. Maybe it shouldn't be named "Galactic Zac", though, because of it not being related to Galactic Nasus, Galactic Renekton, and Galactic Azir.
Lol i know i was simply giving a random name :) Universal Zac, Star Power zac idk lol :) plus i just wanted the idea out there
THEY SHALL ALL BE CLEANSED IN MY PERFORMANCE! {{summoner:1}}
Neat!   Love the mask.   (#not_on_skins_team)
Awwwe bet you have plenty of skin designs to
I swear I hate that sticker lol. It gives off that "I know I just said something a scumbag would say, but I'm innocent I swear!"

Well frankly, you do sound like one. You are seriously tilting the artist. 

"look i drew this skin for my favorite champion, i also worked a lot on it"
"that champ sucks ass draw a skin for this other one"
Whats the sticker?
He needs 4 wings.

If you were trying to look like seraphim (the most classic humanoid angel) you would probably want six wings.

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Seraph
He meant Jhin's sign number. 4 letters, 4 bullets, 4 ultshots, etc.
Doh, good catch, I'm dense.

I GOT CHILLS
it looks very cool
I would strongly support this if his name was Vhin and his base was purple.

This reminds me of the Heavenly Hosts from Doctor Who.

http://i.kinja-img.com/gawker-media/image/upload/qnltai8zgrisnodpbfk1.gif

"Take me to your leader.

I've always wanted to say that!"
The mask reminds me of the god king from infinity blade.

Seeing how he sees himself and that he talks like he is beyond this world with his actions this skin looks like something he would totally be up for.

{{champion:202}} "I will show you the spotlight!"

Absolutely amazing. Love how you played with his base design. Everything works and the wings on his ult would be just way too cool. 

Plz do this. Ive never needed something so bad in my life.
Love it and the look suits the champ imo. Seems like he'd be into gaudy baroque art. :P

I'm thirsty for any Jhin skin at this point. :p

Looks lovely~
It is perfection!
